title: Tool Search and Discovery
description: As a user, I want to search for available tools by keyword so that I can find the tools I need
acceptanceCriteria: AC01: Given any user on the homepage, when they view the search bar, they should be able to enter keywords
AC02: Given a search query, when submitted, then matching tools should be displayed with their images and basic details
AC03: Given search results, when displayed, then they should be sorted by relevance to the search term
AC04: Given a mobile user, when viewing search results, then the layout should be responsive and usable
AC05: Given no search results, when a search is performed, then an appropriate 'no results' message should be displayed
AC06: Given search results, when a user clicks on a tool, then they should see the full tool details
